MonsterTrait.Name: Death Burst
MonsterTrait.Text: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MonsterTrait.Name: False Appearance
MonsterTrait.Text: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of magma.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The mephit can innately cast heat metal (spell save DC 10), requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Fire Breath (Recharge 6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
